title: [Health] Landmark human study is first to reveal strong links between gut microbes, diet and health. Diets rich in certain plant-based foods are linked with the presence of gut microbes that are associated with a lower risk of developing conditions such as obesity, type 2 diabetes and cardiovascular disease
